H0.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. Lee Harvey Oswald

H1.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. James Earl Ray

H2.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. Theodore White

H3.text: Who killed Robert F Kennedy. Sirhan Sirhan

A4.text: Robert F. Kennedy was shot by 24-year-old Sirhan Sirhan at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles, California.

A5.text: Due to Sirhan being a non-citizen, it was illegal under California law for him to purchase firearms. He violated three California laws by possessing the pistol he used to kill Kennedy.

A6.text: Sirhan admitted his guilt in a recorded confession while in police custody on June 9.

A7.text: On April 17, 1969, Sirhan was convicted of first-degree murder, among other charges, and subsequently sentenced to death by gas chamber.
